Name: Invasher
About the game: After an unexpected enemy attack. Inari met an alien named Veg. They came to get resources from this world. Inari gather Riho and Kome to help fight back Veg. Story Mode - Experience core gameplay and story Coop Mode - Play any stages on local up to 4 players Versus Mode - Fight each other on local up to 4 players 3 Difficulty Challenging Stages, Total 500+ Scene Element system Various weapons and more upgrades Variety of enemies Unique platformer per stage 8-Bit soundtrack Challenge boss patterns and bullet hell Boss Rush mode Leaderboards for Speedrun/Time Attack Support GUI for XBox One and PS4 controller Freely customize gameplay button
